column2: Don't be afraid Seiki.__ It's me._ Kage.
I'm glad to see you alive...__ Especially after seing you fall on the battleground. Dorīmā protected your energy from being absorbed.
Looks like the spirit tree was able to resurect you...__ But I'm scared you were the last one,__ the tree is completely corrupted by the Selvos now.
... I saw Dorima getting captured, I guess you are here for him.
My spirit has been trapped for while on this tower. I know every inch of it.
I'll try to help you on your ascent here.
